sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Code, Database, Cloud, Brain, Calculator, Globe, Server, ArrowRight, Clock, Users, Star, Play } from 'lucide-react'; const Courses = () => { const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all'); const courses = [ { id: 1, title: 'Web Development', description: 'Master HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern web development frameworks. Build responsive and interactive websites from scratch.', duration: '12 weeks', students: '2,500+', rating: 4.8, price: '$299', category: 'development', icon: Code, color: 'blue', features: ['HTML5 & CSS3', 'JavaScript ES6+', 'React.js', 'Responsive Design', 'Git & GitHub', 'Deployment'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1461749280684-dccba630e2f6?w=400&h=250&fit=crop' }, { id: 2, title: 'MERN Stack', description: 'Learn the complete MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) to build full-stack web applications.', duration: '16 weeks', students: '1,800+', rating: 4.9, price: '$399', category: 'development', icon: Database, color: 'green', features: ['MongoDB', 'Express.js', 'React.js', 'Node.js', 'REST APIs', 'Authentication'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555066931-4365d14bab8c?w=400&h=250&fit=crop' }, { id: 3, title: 'AWS DevOps', description: 'Master AWS cloud services and DevOps practices. Learn CI/CD, containerization, and infrastructure as code.', duration: '14 weeks', students: '1,200+', rating: 4.7, price: '$499', category: 'devops', icon: Cloud, color: 'orange', features: ['AWS Services', 'Docker & Kubernetes', 'CI/CD Pipelines', 'Terraform', 'Monitoring', 'Security'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1451187580459-43490279c0fa?w=400&h=250&fit=crop' }, { id: 4, title: 'Python Programming', description: 'Learn Python from basics to advanced concepts. Master data structures, algorithms, and popular frameworks.', duration: '10 weeks', students: '3,000+', rating: 4.8, price: '$249', category: 'programming', icon: Code, color: 'yellow', features: ['Python Basics', 'Data Structures', 'OOP', 'Django/Flask', 'Data Analysis', 'Automation'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1526379095098-d400fd0bf935?w=400&h=250&fit=crop' }, { id: 5, title: 'AWS Linux', description: 'Master Linux administration on AWS. Learn server management, security, and cloud infrastructure.', duration: '8 weeks', students: '800+', rating: 4.6, price: '$199', category: 'devops', icon: Server, color: 'red', features: ['Linux Fundamentals', 'AWS EC2', 'Shell Scripting', 'Security', 'Monitoring', 'Backup'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1618401471353-b98afee0b2eb?w=400&h=250&fit=crop' }, { id: 6, title: 'Digital Marketing & SEO', description: 'Learn digital marketing strategies, SEO optimization, social media marketing, and analytics.', duration: '12 weeks', students: '1,500+', rating: 4.7, price: '$299', category: 'marketing', icon: Globe, color: 'teal', features: ['SEO Optimization', 'Social Media Marketing', 'Google Ads', 'Analytics', 'Content Marketing', 'Email Marketing'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1460925895917-afdab827c52f?w=400&h=250&fit=crop' }, { id: 7, title: 'AI/ML', description: 'Master artificial intelligence and machine learning. Learn algorithms, deep learning, and real-world applications.', duration: '20 weeks', students: '900+', rating: 4.9, price: '$599', category: 'ai', icon: Brain, color: 'purple', features: ['Machine Learning', 'Deep Learning', 'Neural Networks', 'TensorFlow/PyTorch', 'Computer Vision', 'NLP'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1677442136019-21780ecad995?w=400&h=250&fit=crop' }, { id: 8, title: 'Mathematics', description: 'Master essential mathematics for computer science, data science, and engineering applications.', duration: '10 weeks', students: '1,200+', rating: 4.6, price: '$199', category: 'mathematics', icon: Calculator, color: 'indigo', features: ['Linear Algebra', 'Calculus', 'Statistics', 'Probability', 'Discrete Math', 'Optimization'], image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1635070041078-e363dbe005cb?w=400&h=250&fit=crop' } ]; const categories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Courses' }, { id: 'development', name: 'Development' }, { id: 'devops', name: 'DevOps' }, { id: 'programming', name: 'Programming' }, { id: 'marketing', name: 'Marketing' }, { id: 'ai', name: 'AI/ML' }, { id: 'mathematics', name: 'Mathematics' } ]; const filteredCourses = selectedCategory === 'all' ? courses : courses.filter(course => course.category === selectedCategory); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Explore Our Courses

Choose from our comprehensive selection of courses designed by industry experts. Start your journey towards a successful career in technology.

{categories.map((category) => ( ))}
{/* Courses Grid */}
{filteredCourses.map((course, index) => (
{/* Course Image */}
{/* Course Content */}

{course.title}

{course.price}

{course.description}

{/* Course Stats */}
{course.duration}
{course.students}
{course.rating}
{/* Course Features */}

What you'll learn:

{course.features.slice(0, 4).map((feature, idx) => (
{feature}
))}
{/* CTA Button */}
))}
{/* No courses found message */} {filteredCourses.length === 0 && (

No courses found

Try selecting a different category or check back later for new courses.

)}
{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Start Learning?

Join thousands of students who have already transformed their careers with our expert-led courses.

); }; export default Courses;
